meta.title: Make your own Meme
meta.description: Meme Studio is a simple and fast website to create and share memes. A list of memes is provided by default but you can also import your own image.

home.label: Create a meme from JPG or PNG images. Edit your image and make your custom meme.

meta.description: Create a meme from JPG or PNG images. Edit your image and make your custom meme.

titles.titleA: Your own meme with Meme Studio

meta.title: About
meta.description: Meme Studio is a simple and fast website to create and share memes. This app is an open source project that you are free to contribute

about.text1: Meme Studio is a simple and fast website to create and share memes. A list of memes is provided by default but you can also import your own image.
about.text2: You have the option of downloading your personalized meme to your device or sharing it directly on your Twitter account. I do not save your meme in our database, so make sure you export your work.
about.contactMe: If you have any suggestions, comments, or if you'd like to report a bug, please use the <1>feedback form</1>. If you want an image removed, please contact me:
about.openSource: Meme Studio is an open source project that you are free to contribute :
